welcome.title: Welcome to Vetra
welcome.subtitle: Your protection extension for crypto transactions
welcome.disclaimer: Vetra helps intercept high-risk transactions — Your decisions remain yours.

explanation.title: Understand your transaction
explanation.transfer: You are transferring {amount} {token} from your wallet ({from}) to the destination wallet ({to}).
explanation.swap: You are swapping {amount} {token} for another token. This involves interacting with a decentralized exchange contract.
explanation.approve: You are giving permission for an application (contract) to spend your {token} on your behalf. Be careful with unlimited permissions!
explanation.default: This is a "{type}" transaction. It involves {amount} {token} and interacts with address {to}.

settings.title: Settings
settings.themeDescription: Choose between light or dark theme
settings.soundAlertsDescription: Play sound when detecting risky transactions
settings.shareInsightsDescription: Helps improve Vetra by sharing anonymized analysis data
settings.transactionMemoryDescription: Allows AI to learn from your previous transactions
settings.smartContractFingerprintsDescription: Save contract signatures for quick verification
settings.privacy: Your private keys remain secure. Vetra never solicits or stores your credentials.

description.pro: Pay only for what you use (GPT 4.0/5.0)

whyPro.title: Why choose Pro?
whyPro.description: With the Pro plan, you gain greater accuracy in analyses using cutting-edge AI models, memory of previous transactions for better pattern detection, and complete control with customized automatic rules.
